live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36678.summary: Some customers in the Grandview Woodland area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36678.title: Apr 22 – Vancouver (Grandview Woodland) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
